result.reason: Feature request for dynamic/virtual connection groups that auto-populate based on criteria like connected status or recent usage, improving navigation in large connection lists.
result.approach: Add a SmartGroup node type with configurable filter predicates (e.g. IsConnected, LastUsed within N days). SmartGroups would be virtual/read-only nodes that dynamically query the ConnectionTreeModel and refresh on connection state changes. Store smart group definitions in the connection file XML alongside regular folders.
